## shit tag

List and create shit tag objects

```
shit tag [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --create          Create a new tag
  -h, --help            help for tag
  -o, --object string   Object that the tag points to (default "HEAD")
  -t, --tag string      Tag name
```
